title: Tvvo sermons the one commending the ministerie in generall: the other defending the office of bishops in particular: both preached, and since enlarged by George Dovvname Doctor of Diuinitie.
author: Downame, George, d. 1634.
publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston [and Humphrey Lownes], and are to be sold in Paules Churchyard by Matthew Lownes [and Felix Kyngston],
